articles.title: Delta variant of Covid-19 now dominant in most European countries, says ECDC - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Delta variant will be the globally dominant strain over the coming months, experts warned, and said it will continue to spread, displacing the circulation of other variants unless a new more competitive virus emerges. | World News
articles.content: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) and World Health Organisations (WHO) regional office for Europe warned on Monday that the Delta variant of Covid-19 is now dominant in th… [+2062 chars]

articles.title: Pink offers to pay bikini bottom fines for Norway beach handball team - Global News

articles.content:
The European Handball Federation (EHF) just gave Pink a reason to get involved.
